feature.label: ch.sbb.scion.rcp.swtbot.feature
feature.description: This integration of the SCION Microfrontend Platform with Eclipse RCP allows embedding web-based microfrontends in native rich client applications.
feature.license: SchweizerischeBundesbahnen/scion-rcp is licensed under the Eclipse Public License 2.0 This commercially-friendly copyleft license provides the ability to commercially license binaries; a modern royalty-free patent license grant; and the ability for linked works to use other licenses, including commercial ones.
